title: Battlefield Ghosts - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/8/22
itunes:title: Battlefield Ghosts - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/8/22
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and author Adrian Lee explore his investigations into spirits of soldiers that remain at the sites of famous battles and plane crashes, his EVP recordings of the sounds of battle, and why the energy of warfare stays at a place long after the battles are over.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
